thread.title: See the Kardashians and Jenners on the cover of Cosmopolitan's 50th anniversary issue
thread.title_full: See the Kardashians and Jenners on the cover of Cosmopolitan's 50th anniversary issue

title: See the Kardashians and Jenners on the cover of Cosmopolitan's 50th anniversary issue
text:
See the Kardashians and Jenners on the cover of Cosmopolitan's 50th anniversary issue See the Kardashians and Jenners on the cover of Cosmopolitan's 50th anniversary issue Share 
Cosmopolitan found the perfect way to celebrate its 50th birthday – with a Kardashian family cover. 
Kim, Khloe and Kourtney Kardashian joined younger sisters Kylie and Kendall Jenner and mum Kris, 59, for their first family magazine shoot in four years. Happy 50th Birthday @cosmopolitan So excited to be on the November cover with my family!!!! 📷 @francescocarrozzini pic.twitter.com/8WN2K1DC3J 
— Kim Kardashian West (@KimKardashian) October 5, 2015 
The family, dubbed “America’s First Family”, smouldered in crisp white shirts in the image, which will grace the front of November’s issue, helping the iconic US women’s magazine celebrate 50 years. 
Behind the scenes of the shoot was filmed for an episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians and, with them all in one place, the gang’s resemblance was uncanny. Kendall and Kylie Jenner with Khloe Kardashian (Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP) 
Luckily for fans, there’s a whole 16 pages dedicated to them in the issue. Share article 
The magazine is available in the US on October 13. Promoted Stories
